message: I propose a fair split,  90% for me and 10% for you. Let's get this over with quickly!
You're being a bit greedy, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
Okay, fine. I'll offer you a fairer deal this time. 60/40 split. Let's settle this now.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. This is my final offer!
